main event: On August 15, 1963, a UFO sighting was reported involving a flat disk-like object with a round dome on top, observed for 52 seconds.
interesting points: The object exhibited a slight up and down motion, The witnesses noted an expansion and contraction of the object, Exhaust appeared to come from the sides of the object instead of being propelled vertically, One witness described the light as resembling a piece of solid wood burning in a fireplace, The object's speed was estimated to range between 1500 and 8,700.
sighted object: flat disk with a round dome
witness description: both witnesses were 23 years old and worked as an aircraft cleaner for Eastern Airlines
